title: Performance comparison of high throughput single-cell RNA-Seq platforms in complex tissues
content:

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Yolanda Colino-Sanguino, Laura Rodriguez de la Fuente, Brian Gloss, Andrew M.K. Law, Kristina Handler, Marina Pajic, Robert Salomon, David Gallego-Ortega, Fatima Valdes-Mora
